title: AMA  Myworld6 (bored)

replies.body:
1. UK, close to london.
2. Cheesepuffs
3. Cheesepuffs
4. Cheesepuffs
5. Red
6. Dog
7. Canyon
8. Yes, all the other cheese eaters have left. ='( (In all seriousness, yes, I believe it is dying.) 
9. A noob called Lokigh told me about it. =P
